msItem.title: List of Ethiopian Kings until Mǝnilǝk II (Amharic and Gǝʾǝz)
msItem.note: Written by ʾalaqā Gabra Māryām of Gondar, who is possibly . The text is written in a mixture of Amharic and Gǝʾǝz.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ እዌጥን፡ ኁልቈ፡ ነገሥታት፡ ዘብሔረ፡ ሐበሻ፡ ወጐንደር፡ ዘተወጥነ፡ በአክሱም፡ ወተፈጸመ፡ በጐንደር። ዕብነ፡ ሀኪም፡ መንግሥት፡ ከእስራኤል፡ አልወጣችም፡ ኢትዮጵያ፡ ብሂል፡ ሀበሻ፡ ከምሉዕ፡ በክፍሉ፡ ከብዙ፡ በጥቂቱ፡ አብርሃ፡ ወአጽብሃ፡ ነገሡ፡ ፬ ዓመት፡
msItem.explicit: ወነግሠ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ዘብሔረ፡ ትግሬ፡ ፲፰። ወእምድኅረዝ፡ ቦአት፡ መንግሥት፡ መንገለ፡ ሼዋ፡ ኀበ፡ ቤተ፡ ምን፡ ይልክ፡ ዳግማይ፡ ሞአ፡ አንበሳ፡ ዘእምነገደ፡ ይሁዳ፡ ተፈጸመ፡ ኁልቀ፡ ነገሥታተ፡ ኢትዮጵያ። ። ወጸሐፋ፡ አለቃ፡ ገብረ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘብሔረ፡ ጎንደር፡ ሙፃዑ፡ እምቤተ፡ መንግሥት፤

msItem.title: List of the Churches of Gondar
msItem.note: List of 45 churches in Gondar and the surrounding area, including information on their water supplies. This list was compiled by the same author as the list of kings above.
msItem.incipit: እዌጥን፡ በረድኤተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ኍልቀ፡ አድባራት፡ ዘብሔረ፡ ጎንደር፡ ፩ ድባ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ ውሀው፡ ከዚያው፡ ታላቁ፡ ውሀ፡ ግን፡ ምንጭ፡ ይባላል። ፪ ስምዖን፡ ዘዓምድ። ውሀ፡ አለ፡ ምንጭ። ፫ ደብረ፡ ብርሃን፡ ምንጭ፡ አለ፡ ፬ ጴጥሮስ፡ ጳውሎስ፡ ውሀ፡ አለ፡ ምንጭ።

supportDesc.collation: Bifolio, assembled and glued together with , , , and .

msItem.title: List of Kings (fragment)
msItem.note: Fragment of a list of Ethiopian kings, including those of the Zāgʷe and the early Solomonid dynasties ending with a section about ʾabuna Takla Hāymānot. The text begins abruptly.
msItem.incipit: አንበሳ፡ ወድም፡ ወለዶ፡ ለድልንአድ፡ ዘእምኔሁ፡ ተሀይደት፡ መንግሥት፡ ወተውህበት፡ ለካልዓን፡ እለ፡ ኢኮኑ፡ እም፳ኤል፡ ዘውእቶሙ፡ ዘጓ፡

supportDesc.collation: Single leaf, assembled and glued together with , , , and .
supportDesc.condition: The leave must have been folded into eighths for a long time.

custodialHist.custEvent: The leaf is glued together on the verso side with strips of blue paper.

msItem.title: List of Ethiopian Kings (fragment)
msItem.note: A list of Ethiopian kings, beginnging with Gabra Masqal, identified as ‘ms. i’ in 18 . The text was written on the unfolded bifolio and begins abruptly.
msItem.incipit: ቤተ፡ እስራኤል፡ ፰ ወርኃ። ገብረ፡ መስቀል፡ ነግሠ፡ ፲ወ፬ ዓመተ፡ እምልደተ፡ እግዚእነ፡ በ፮፻ ዓመት፡ ወእምእምነተ፡ ኢትዮጵያ፡ በ፪፻፹ ዓመት፡ እምፍጥረተ፡ ዓለም፡ ፷፻ወ፪፻፲ ዓመት፡

item.desc: Note in blue pencil by .

history.provenance: The manuscript was acquired from the monastery of Dabra Libānos (Šǝmazānā)

msItem.title: Gʷǝlt Records of Dabra Libānos of Ham
msItem.note: Four notes concerning the fiefs (gʷǝlt) of Dabra Libānos and of the churches related to it. Texts in Gǝʿǝz and Amharic.

msItem.title: Gʷǝlt Record of Dabra Libānos of Ham
msItem.note: Gʷǝlt records of Dabra Libānos of Ham, which are almost identical to the text in 5 186.
msItem.incipit: ጕናጕና፡ ቀዳሚ፡ ምድሩ፡ ለአባ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ዘሃነጻ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ገብረ፡ መስቀል፡

msItem.title: Gʷǝlt Record of Dabra Libānos of Ham
msItem.incipit: የመረታ፡ አብያተ፡ ክርስቲያናት፡ ዓዲ፡ አውሂ፡ እዳማርያም፡ ማይ፡ አሀ፡ አሰጣህ፡ እዳማርያም፡ ሀሊቦ፡ እዳጋብር፡ ተውሮ፡ እዳሚካልኤልኤል ፡

msItem.title: Gʷǝlt Record of Dabra Libānos of Ham
msItem.incipit: ዓዲ፡ ከረን፡ ቅዱስ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ዑና፡ አንዶም፡ ዕዳጊዮርጊስ፡ ማይ፡ እዝጊ፡ ዕዳ፡ ቍስቋም፡ ግንዘቦ፡ ማርያም፡ አሲራ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ተድረር፡ ጕልት፡ መሆኑ፡ የቀረ፡ በግራኝ፡ ነው፡

msItem.title: Gʷǝlt Record of Dabra Libānos of Ham
msItem.incipit: ወእምዝ፡ ሆረ፡ ሰራዌ፡ ወነበረ፡ ውስተ፡ ጉህ፡ ጽያ፡ ፸ አመተ፡ ውስተ፡ ከርሰ፡ ጾላእት፡ ሃጤ፡ ገብረ፡ መስቀል፡ ፯ አድ፡ በጉህጽያ፡ ሰጡት።

item.desc: Note in black pencil.
Letter ‘E’ noted in black pencil in the left upper corner.

msItem.title: List of Gʷǝlt Records of Dabra Bizan (dabdābbe)
msItem.note: List of gʷǝlt records of Dabra Bizan. The text was written by the successor of Bǝṣuʿa ʾAmlāk, ʾabbā Bakʷǝra Dǝngǝl. The text was written across the entire width of the unfolded bifolio. It begins with a record of the meeting of Bǝṣuʿa ʾAmlāk and King Naʿod. Cf. 393, 427–428.
msItem.incipit: ንወጥን፡ ጺሒፈ፡ ደብዳቤ፡ ሶበ፡ መጽአ፡ አቡነ፡ ብፁዓ፡ አምላክ፡ እምነ፡ ኮዳዱ፡ ወስተ፡ውስተ፡ ዛቲ፡ ገዳም፡ ነበረ፡ ፫፡ ዓመተ፡ በሕይወቱ።

item.desc: Note in blue pencil by .
Letter ‘A’ noted in black pencil in the left upper corner.

msItem.title: List of the Churches of ʾƎnda Śǝllāse
msItem.note: List of churches that depended on ʾƎnda Śǝllāse. The title is written by the hand of : ኈልቈ፡ አብያተ፡ ክርስቲያናት፡ ዘእንዳ፡ ሥላሴ። Cf. 429 .
msItem.incipit: ፈቀየደህ፡ እንዳ፡ ማርያም፡ እንዳ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ መረታ፡ ሀሬን፡ አድ፡ ረዕስ፡ እንዳ፡ ሥላሴ፡

extent.note: Two halves of a leaf, which are glued together on the verso side.

item.desc: Letter ‘C’ and letter ‘D’ respectively noted in the left upper corner of each of the two folios.

msItem.note: Historical notes on the city of Gondar, copied by ʾalaqā Ḥawāz, who was the head of the Gǝmǧā Bet Māryām church in Gondar, as it is attested in a note by the hand of on the cover. According to 125 II 302, the text mentions and was therefore authored under the reign of , but 43 identified the name with Manan, who was the mother of rās ʾAli, assuming a slightly earlier dating of the text to the first half of the 20th century.
msItem.incipit: ታሪክ፡ ዘምድረ፡ ጐንደር፡ እንዲህ፡ ይላሉ። ለአፄ፡ ፋሲል፡ መልአከ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሌሊት፡ እየመጣ፡ በራእይ፡ ይነግርዎ፡ ነበር፡ ጐ፡ ትነግሥ፡ እያለ፡ አፄ፡ ፋሲልም፡ ለሕዝቡ፡ ሁሉ፡ እስኪ፡ ጐ፡ የሚባል፡ አገር፡ ፈልጉ፡ አሉ፡ ሕዝቡም፡ ይፈልጉ፡ ጀመር፡ ሲፈልጉ፡ አሪጎ፡ የሚባል፡ አገር፡ ተገኘ፡ ብለው፡ ለአፄ፡ ነገሩ፡ አፄም፡ ጐን፡ ሲፈልጉ፡ አሪጎ፡ ከተማ፡ አደረጉ፡ ከእለታት፡ አንድ፡ ቀን፡ የንጉሡ፡ ባልደራስ፡

msItem.title: List of Aksumite kings
msItem.note: Transliteration of a list of Aksumite kings by the hand of copied from the manuscript Pistoia, Ms. Martini etiop. n. 1 (= Zanutto n. 1), fol. 68r (ms. O of the list C). This list corresponds to list F in 28, but appears not to be used for this edition. The list stops, as indicated in a final note, with a king with the name Malak Sagad (possibly either or ).
msItem.incipit: wadāwit walado lasalomon. wasalomon walado laebna elḥakim, waebna elḥakim walado laabrākid. waabrākid walado laatārām. waatārām walado laʾabrālyus. waʾabrālyus walado lawarada ṣaḥay

msItem.title: List of Aksumite Kings
msItem.note:
Transliteration of a list of Aksumite kings copied by the hand of , from the manuscript Pistoia, Ms. Martini etiop. n. 1 (= Zanutto n. 1), fol. 67r (ms. C of the list H).
Cf. 44. It is mentioned that the list stops with a king with the name Malak Sagad (possibly either or ).
msItem.incipit: ela nagsu esrāʾēl baʾityopyā znʾetu asmātihomu. 1 ebna elḥakim. 2 tomāy. 3 azbāy

msItem.title: List of Aksumite Kings
msItem.note:
Transliteration of a list of Aksumite kings by the hand of , copied from the manuscript Pistoia, Ms. Martini etiop. n. 1 (= Zanutto n. 1), fol. 57r (ms. O of the list C)
Cf. 27.
msItem.incipit: Ms. Martini F. 57r – ʿāmatāta nagastāta aksum ela nagsu baityopyā. zaʾarwē ʿāmat 400. zabʾesē angabo zasadado laarwē 200. zagdur zabanuḥ 100. zasabaṣa basādo 50 wabaʾaksum 50

msItem.title: List of Ethiopian Kings
msItem.note: Transliteration of a list of Ethiopian kings by the hand of from a manuscript of ʾAbbā ʾƎndrǝyās, beginning with ʾAbrǝhā and ʾAṣbǝhā up to Lǝbna Dǝngǝl.
msItem.incipit: Ms. di Abba Endreyàs. – wa hezb qads waldo layārēd walanagst ḥezbā. emledata egziʾ ba 340 ʿā ḥanaṣwā abrha wa aṣbḥa ḥanaṣwā laʾakuesum

msItem.title: List of Ethiopian Kings
msItem.note: Transliteration of a list of Ethiopian kings by the hand of , following an unidentified manuscript, which is described in on . The list contains the kings of ʾAksum and later periods until Naʿod. It is a variant of the list of kings C that was not used in .
msItem.incipit: ʿamatāta magaśta aksum zaʾarwē 100 ʿāmat nagśa zabʾesi angābo zasadado laʾarwē waqatalo 200 ʿāmat nagśa gedur zabenuḥ 100 ʿāmat nagśa basabādo lasodo 50 ʿāmat

item.desc: Description of the manuscript, from which this text has been transliterated, explaining that it was parchment from the 18th or 19th century with 106 folios, where there is a note on fol. 3v signalling a list of kings on fol. 105rb together with other lists. Written in Italian and transliterated Gǝʿǝz.
item.q: ṣaḥafku zanta maṣḥafa zaysamay kitārā tašbuḥt zawʾetu enzirā sebḥat zaynagr lawalata dāwit

msItem.title: Note on Biblical Chronology
msItem.note: Note on biblical chronology, probably taken from , and copied in the monastery of ʾƎndā Yoḥannǝs in , as indicated in a note by ( in ).
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ ዘተርጐመ፡ ዝንቱ፡ ኍልቈ፡ ዓመታት፡ ዘአበው፡ ዘተርጐመ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ንጉሥነ፡ ዘርአ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘተሰምየ፡ ቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ወኢኮነ፡ ከመ፡ ካልዕ፡ ኍልቍ፡ ዓማታት፡ ኢኈለቍዎ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ አላ፡ እምኦሪት፡ ወእምነቢያት፡ ወነገሥት፡ ወዕዝራ፡ ዘልደት፡ ዘዐረቢ፡ ለአዳም፡ ኍልቈ፡ ዓመቱ፡ እስከ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለሄኖስ፡
msItem.explicit: ወኅድረቶሙ፡ ለእስራኤል፡ በምድረ፡ ግብፅ፡ ወምድረ፡ ከነአን፡ ፬፻፡ ወ፴ ዓመት፡ ወኵሉ፡ ድሙር፡

msItem.title: Note on Biblical Chronology
msItem.note: Note on biblical chronology, possibly taken from , and similar to , copied in the monastery of ʾƎndā Yoḥannǝs in as indicated in a note by ( in ).
msItem.incipit: እምአብርሃም፡ እስከ፡ ጻእቶሙ፡ ለእስራኤል፡ ፯፻፳ ዓመት፡ ወእም፡ አዳም፡ ፴፻ወ፬፻፶ወ፪ ዓመት፡ ዘመሳፍንት፡ ዘአረቢ፡ ገዛ፡ ፲ ዓመት፡
msItem.explicit: እምአዳም፡ ፵፻ወ፬፻፵ወ፭ ዓመት፡ ወ፫ አውራኃ፡ ወኵሉ፡ ድሙር፡ እምአዳም፡ እስከ፡ ንስአተ፡ ዕዝራ፡ ፶፻ ዓመት፡

item.desc: Note by the hand of , indicating that this text has been copied in the monastery of ʾƎndā Yoḥannǝs in .

msItem.title: Chronology of Ethiopian Kings
msItem.note: Chronology of Ethiopian kings until Yoḥannǝs IV, which is similar to the list of kings E, copied from a manuscript of ʾƎndā Yoḥannǝs in (cf. ). Cf. 41.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ ንዌጥን፡ ጽሒፈ፡ ዜና፡ ነገሥት፡ አበዊነ፡ ጻድቃን፡ ወኅሩያን፡ በረድኤተ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ አሜን፡ ሳኦል፡ ነግሠ፡ ፵ ዓመተ፡ ዳዊት፡ ነግሠ፡ ፵ ዓመተ፡ ዳዊት፡ ወለዶ፡ ለሰሎሞን፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ነግሠ፡ ፵ ዓመተ፡ ንግሥተ፡ አዜብ፡ ወለተ፡ አጋቦስ፡ ንግሥተ፡ አዜብ፡ ምስለ፡ አቡሃ፡ ወምስለ፡ ብፁዓን፡ ቀተልዎ፡ ለአርዌ፡ ምድር፡ ወእምድኅረ፡ ሞተ፡ አርዌ፡ ምድር፡ ሖረት፡ ኀበ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ንጉሥ፡ ወይቤላ፡

msItem.title: Story of the Construction of the Church Dabra Yoḥannǝs
msItem.note: Possibly about .
msItem.incipit: የኛ፡ ቤተክርስቲያን፡ ደብረ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ የተሰራበት፡ በሐጸይ፡ ገብረ፡ መስቀል፡ ሊጅ፡ ይስሐቅ፡ ወስመ፡ መንግሥቱ፡ ቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ታሪኩ፡ ግን፡ ፍት፡ በታች፡ ወሀ፡ ካለበት፡ ተሰርቶ፡ ነበር፡ ዘትሰመይ፡ ቤተ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወይብልዎ፡ ካዕበ፡ ማየ፡ ወገዴ፡ እንተ፡ ኀደረ፡ ወስቴታ፡ ለሊሁ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ዮሐንስ፡

handNote.desc: Smaller, rather careful, but clumsy handwriting.

item.desc: Note by the hand of , indicating, that this text has been copied in the monastery of ʾƎndā Yoḥannǝs in .
Below the text a note, indicating that this text has been copied in the monastery of Dabra Yoḥannǝs on 27th Ṭǝrr 1893 of Ethiopian calendar (= 4th february 1901 AD).
item.q: ተጽህፈ፡ በደብረ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ በ፳፯ በጥር፡ በ፲፰፻፺፫፡

msItem.title: List of Ethiopian Kings and Chronological Notes in Tigrinyā
msItem.note: Same text as and probably a copy of it.

msItem.title: List of Ethiopian Kings
msItem.note: List of Ethiopian kings up to and his brother , which was copied from a manuscript of , that contained the text of the . It is the ms. ‘g’ in the list ‘B’ in 18.
msItem.incipit: ሰሎሞን፡ ወለዶ፡ ለእብነ፡ ሐኪም፡ ዘውእቱ፡ ምንይልክ። ምንይልክ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለተማይ፡ ተማይ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለዘግዱር፡ ዘግዱር፡ ወለዶ፡ ለአክሱማይ፡ አክሱማይ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለአክሱማዮስ፡

msItem.title: Chronological Notes in Tigrinyā
msItem.incipit: ካብ፡ ናይ፡ ጐይታና፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ልደት፡ ክሳዕ፡ ሐፀይ፡ ተኽለ፡ ጊዮርጊስ። ሽሕን፡ ፯፻፸፪፡ አመትን፡ ፬ ወርኅን። ይኸውን። ታሪከ፡ ነገሥት፡ ከምዝበለ፡ ካብናይ፡ አርዌ፡ መንግሥት፡ ክሳዕ፡ ንግሥተ፡ አዜብ፡ ፰፻፡ እዩ፡ ካባአ፡ ክሳዕ፡ ሥጋዌ፡ ሽሕን፡ ፶፰፡ አመት፡ እዩ፡ ይብል፡

item.desc: A note at the top margin, written in pencil and repeated or traced by the same ink as it was used by .
item.q: Lista B del Kebra Nagast di Halai

msItem.title: List of Ethiopian Kings and Chronological Notes in Tigrinyā
msItem.note: Copy of the same text as and probably a copy of it.

item.desc: Additional Chronological notes in Tigrinyā. Probably this text is misplaced and does not belong to the list above.
item.q: ገበል፡ መንግሥቲ፡ ሀገርና፡ በጽቡቅ። ትምሕርቲ፡ በርሔት፡ ስንክሳር፡ ከምዝበለ፡ ገበል፡ ፳፭ አመት።

item.desc: A note by .
item.q: Trascritta dal ክብረ፡ ነገሥት፡ du Halai

item.desc: The letter ‘B’ was noted by at the bottom in red.
The title was added in red ink.

binding.decoNote: Three bifolia, which are sewn together

msItem.title: Chronology of Ethiopian Kings
msItem.note: Beginning with the kings of the Zāgʷe-dynasty up to .
msItem.incipit: በዝየ፡ ንኄልቍ፡ ዕድሜ፡ መንግሥቶሙ፡ ለነገሥተ፡ ዘጓ፡ በከመ፡ ሰማዕነ፡ እማዕምራነ፡ ሕግ፡ ቀዳሚ፡ መራ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ነግሠ፡ ፫ ዓመተ፡ ጠጠድም፡ ነገሠ፡ ፵፡ ዓመተ፡ ጀን፡ ስዩም፡ ነግሠ፡ ፵ ዓመተ፡

msItem.title: List of Aksumite Kings
msItem.note: The word ‘Gura’ was written by the hand of at the right margin (cf. ), which makes it possible to identify this fragment with the manuscript ‘h’ in as edited in 18.
msItem.incipit: ንጽሕፍ፡ ዜና፡ ነገሥታት። ዳዊትኒ፡ ወልዶ፡ ለሰሎሞን፡ ወሰሎሞን፡ ወለዶ፡ ለእብነ፡ ሐኪም፡ ወእብነ፡ ሐኪም፡ ወለዶ፡ ለቶማይ፡ ወቶማይ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለዘግዱር፡ ወዘግዱር፡ ወለዶ፡ ለአኩሱማይ፡ ወአኩሱማይ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለአውስዮ፡

msItem.title: List of Aksumite Kings
msItem.incipit: ወእምዝ፡ መሐሮሙ፡ አባ፡ ሰላማ፡ ዜና፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ሎቱ፡ ስብሐት። ወቅድሜሆሙ፡ አምኑ፡ ወተጠምቁ፡ ጥምቀተ፡ ክርስትና፡ እምነቶሙኒ፡ ኮነ፡ እምልደተ። ክርስቶስ፡ በ፫፻፴ወ፭ ዓመት፡ ወሐነጽዋ። በአኵስም። አብርሃ፡ ወአጽብሃ፡ አብርሃ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለአስፍሕ። ወአስፍሕ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለአርፍድ።

msItem.title: Note on the Agreement of Emperor Constantine with King Kāleb
msItem.note: Note of about ten lines on the alleged agreement between Emperor Constantine and King Kāleb to combat the Jews of .
msItem.incipit: ንጉሠ፡ ሮም፡ ቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ወካሌብ፡ ንጉሠ፡ ኢትዮጵያ፡ ተራከቡ፡ በኢየሩሳሌም፡ ወሰርዑ፡ ቍርባነ፡ ሊቃነ፡ ጳጳሳቲሆሙ፡ ወቀርቡ፡ ወኃብሩ፡ ሃይማኖተ፡

item.desc: Note in Amharic at the bottom of the page.
item.q: ወተወልደ፡ አቡነ፡ መርቆሬዎስ፡ በ፲፻ወ፭፻፡ ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያንም፡ ከተሰራ፡ እስከ፡ ዛሬ፡ ፭፻፺፡ ዓመት፡ ኁነዋል፡

item.desc: The word ‘Gura’ written by the hand of at the right margin, referring to the church of Gurāʿ, a village in , and which is probably identical with , mentioned in the .
item.q: ወተወልደ፡ አቡነ፡ መርቆሬዎስ፡ በ፲፻ወ፭፻፡ ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያንም፡ ከተሰራ፡ እስከ፡ ዛሬ፡ ፭፻፺፡ ዓመት፡ ኁነዋል፡

history.provenance: According to from a church in Gurāʿ, which is a village in , and which is probably identical with .

msItem.title: Chronological Notes on Ethiopian Kings
msItem.note: Copied from a manuscript from .
msItem.incipit: ዘተጽሕፈ፡ እመጻሕፍተ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘመጠራ። በስመ፡ ንዌጥን፡ ጽሒፈ፡ ዜና፡ አበዊነ፡ ወተአምረ፡ ወመንክራተ፡ ዘገብረ፡ ላዕሌሆሙ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ ወአሜን። እምአመ፡ ነግሠ፡ አጼ፡ መለክ፡ ሰገድ፡ በ፲፡ ወ፭ ዓመት፡ ሞተ፡ ዘርአ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወበ፲፡ ወ፪ቱ፡ አመት፡ ሞተ፡ ሐርቦ፡ ወበ፲፡ ወ፫፡ ዓመት፡ መጽአ፡ መሐመድ፡ ወበ፲፡ ወ፬፡ ዓመት፡ ሞተ፡ መሐመድ፡
በስመ፡ ጸሎት፡ ዘተስእለቶ፡ ማርያም፡ ለእግዚእነ፡ ወትቤሎ፡ ንግረኒ፡ ስመከ። ወአውሥኣ፡ ወትቤላ፡ እፎ፡ እነግርኪ፡ ስምየ፡

msItem.note: With various readings, different from , which was the basis for the edition of .
msItem.incipit:
በስመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሥሉስ፡ ኅቡር፡ ህላዌሁ፡ ልዑል፡
ንጽሕፍ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ገድሉ፡ ለብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ አባ፡ ዮሐኒ፡ ኮከብ፡ ብሩህ፡ ዘብሔረ፡ አግዓዚ፡ ወገባሬ፡ ተአምራት፡ ወመንክራት፡ ዘደብረ፡ ዓሣ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ ስምዑ፡ አኃውየ፡ ዜና፡ ገድሉ፡ ለብእሴ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ አባ፡ ዮሐኒ። ወሀሎ፡ ፩ ብእሲ፡ ሥዩመ፡ ተምቤን፡ ወክቡር፡ ወዓቢይ፡ ውእቱ፡

msItem.note: Beginning of the homily of about 10 lines. The end is missing.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ ድርሳን፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ክቡር፡ ወብፁዕ፡ አባ፡ ሚናስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአኵሱም፡ በእንተ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ አባ፡ ዮሐኒ።

msItem.title: List of Aksumite Kings (fragment)
msItem.note: Copied from the manuscript Pistoia, Ms. Martini etiop. n. 1 (= Zanutto n. 1), fol. 67r-v (ms. O of the list C). Cf. 27.
msItem.incipit: እለ፡ ነግሡ፡ እስራኤል፡ በኢትዮጵያ፡ ዝውእቱ፡ አስማቲሆሙ፡

msItem.title: List of Ethiopian Kings (fragment)
msItem.note: Copied from a manuscript of ʾAbbā ʾƎndrǝyās of Saffǝʿā. The text begins abruptly.
msItem.incipit:
ወሕዝብ፡ ቀድስ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለያሬድ፡ ወለንግሥት፡ ሕዝባ። እምልደተ፡ እግዚእ፡ በ፫፻፵ ዓ፡ ሐነጽዋ፡ አብርሃ፡ ወአጽብሐ፡ ሐነጽዋ፡ ለአኵሱም። አብርሃ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለአስፋሕ። አስፋሕ፡ ወለዶ፡ ለአርፋድ።
ስምዖን፡ ወለዶ፡ ለእንበረም፡ በመዋዕሊሁ፡ መጽአ፡ አባ፡ ሰላም፡ በመንግሥተ፡ ዘጓ።

item.desc: List of Aksumite Kings, which is probably the one of manuscript ‘R’ of the list A in 10.

msItem.title: List of the monastery’s fiefs of ʾƎndā Yoḥannǝs
msItem.note: Text of six lines containing an enumeration of the gʷǝlt territories, belonging to the monastery of ʾƎndā Yoḥannǝs, written on the 18th of Ṭǝrr, with no indication of the year.
msItem.incipit: የእንዳ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ገዳም፡ ጉልት፡ አጕላእ፡ ሃደስ፡ አዲ፡ ነብር፡ አዲ፡ ጐልጐል፡

supportDesc.condition: The upper fringe of the bifolio has been cut off.

item.desc: Text of a letter, which was sent from the monastery to lieutenants De Rosso and Bruno Rinaldo, comprising about seven lines.
item.q: ይድረስ፡ ኀበ፡ ጐይታና፡ ትንንት፡ ደሮሶ፡ ወሀበ፡ ጐይታና፡ ትንንት፡ ብሩኖ፡ ሪናልዶ።

item.desc: Note concerning the ‘government licence holders’ of , which comprises about four lines.
item.q: እኛ፡ ግን፡ የመንግሥት፡ ፍቃደኛች፡ ነነ፡ ሰንጐነይት፡ ግራዥማች፡ ተስፋ፡ ማርያም፡ የደጃች፡ ባህታ፡ አማች፡ ይዘውት፡

item.desc: Note in blue pencil by .

msItem.title: Act of execution of a testamentary provision in favour of the church ʾƎndā Śǝllāse of Harar
msItem.note: Execution of a testamentary disposition whereby bequeaths a house to the church ʾAdāre Ṭiqo Makāna Śǝllāse of Harar, on 7 Ṭǝqǝmt 1924 in Ethiopian calendar (= 18 October 1931 AD). Done on 4 April 1939 AD.
msItem.incipit: ባ፲፱፻፳፬ ዓመት፡ ም፡ ጥቅምት፡ ፯ቀን፡ ኪዳነ፡ ማርያም፡ ወልደ፡ ዓብ፡ የተናዘዘው፡ የኑዛዜ፡ ቃል፡ ገልባጭ፡ ነው፡ ተብሎ፡ ባደሬ፡ ጢቆ፡ ሥላሴ፡ የከተማ፡ እርስት፡ መጻፊያ፡ በነበረው፡ መዝገብ፡
msItem.explicit: ያውራ፡ ጣት፡ ፊርማ፡ ተዋበት፤ ትሳሜ፡ አጸደ፡ ማህተም፡ ደለሉ፡ የጸህፈት፡ ፊርማ፡ ጣሰሙ፡ አየለ፡ የሚል፡ ተጽፎ፡ አለ፡ ሺ፡ ፱፻፴፱ን፡ አፕሪሊ፡ ፬ ቀን፡

item.desc: Indication of the content on the upper part of the leaf.
A note by the hand of on the lower part of the leaf.
item.q: (copia di un ms. della chiesa di Endà Sellasié di Harar)

msItem.title: Genealogy of the descendants of Balaw
msItem.incipit: በለው፡ ሻሕ፡ ወለደ፡ ሻሕ፡ ገብረዮሃን፡ ወለደ፡ ገብረዮሃን፡ ዮወሴፍንጉስ፡ ወለደ፡

msItem.title: Genealogy of the descendants of Hǝmazen

item.desc: A note by another hand in pencil, which mentions the baḥr nagāš Kabte.

msItem.title: List of Ethiopian Kings (zenā nagaśt)
msItem.note: Copied from a tārika nagaśt of ʾAksum by ʾalaqā Baʾǝda Māryām of ʾAddi Galgǝl (Ṣallimā) and written in Amharic and in Gǝʿǝz. The first chapter is written in Amharic, at the end of the second chapter, the text is Gǝʿǝz. The text stops with the reign of on . According to the colophon at the end, written in 1905 AM (= 1912/1913 AD).
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ ንዌጥን፡ በረድኤተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዜና፡ ነገሥት፡ ጻድቃን፡ ወኅሩያን። ዘኢትዮጵያ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ ዓሜን። መንግሥተ፡ አኵሱም፡ ከሳኦል፡ መንግሥት፡ በፊት፡ ፬፻ተ፰ ዘመን፡ ትቀድማለች፡ ከዚያ፡ በፊት፡ ምን፡ መንግሥት፡ ነበረ፡ ቢሉ፡ ምድረ፡ አኵሱም፡ በእግዚአብሔር፡ ፈቃድ፡ ተመርጣ፡ አድራ፡ አለች።
msItem.explicit: ተጽሕፈ፡ በ፲፻ወ፱፻ወ፭ ዓመት፡ በዘመነ፡ ማቴዎስ፡ ወንጌላዊ። እምአመ፡ ተፈጥረ፡ ዓለም፡ እስከ፡ ተመጠወ፡ ሙሴ፡ ጽላት፡ ፴፻፡ ወ፲፻፴ወ፪ ዓመት፡ በኢያሱኒ፡ ነበረት፡ ፵ ዓመት።

msItem.title: Short Chronicles (fragment)
msItem.note: Copy of a manuscript from concerning the period from Malak Sagad (Malak Sagad I, Śarḍa Dǝngǝl) until the reign of .
msItem.incipit: እምአመ፡ ነግሡ፡ አፄ፡ መለክ፡ ሰገድ፡ በ፲ወ፩ ዓመት፡ ሞተ፡ ዘርአ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወበ፡ ፲፡ ወ፪ቱ፡ አመት፡ ሞተ፡ ሐርቦ፡ ወበ፲፡ ወ፫፡ ዓመት፡ መጽአ፡ መሐመድ፡ ወበ፡ ፲ወ፬ ዓመት፡ ሞተ፡ መሐመድ፡ ወበ፲ወ፮፡ ዓመት፡ ሞተ፡ ይስሐቅ፡

msItem.title: Copy of Three Historical Fragments
msItem.note: Three fragments of historical texts, copied from a manuscript from ʾƎndā ʾƎndrǝyās in Daqqi Yǝṭāʿǝs (cf. ).

msItem.title: Historical Note concerning the Journey of Queen Mākedā (Queen ʾAzeb) to King Salomon
msItem.incipit: ወበ፬ ዓመት፡ መንግሥቱ፡ ለሰሎሞን፡ ወረደት፡ ንግሥተ፡ አዜብ፡ ኢየሩሳሌም፡ ወተመይጠት፡ ብሔራ፡ በ፪ ዓመት።

msItem.title: Historical Note concerning the Time of Tewodros and Yoḥannǝs
msItem.note: Concerning probably and either . The fragment ends with the mention of daǧǧāč Wǝbe.

msItem.title: Fragment of a List of Ethiopian Kings
msItem.note: Beginning with ʾAbrǝhā and ʾAṣbǝhā up to Gabra Masqal (possibly ).

msItem.title: Genealogy of Ethiopian Monks
msItem.note: Copy of a fragment from a manuscript from ‘Ciaresci’ (probably ), which was presented by the kantibā to . The owner of the original was named Fǝqura Māryām. The text was edited in .
msItem.incipit: ንዌጥን፡ ታሪከ፡ አበዊነ፡ መነኮሳት። ጸሎቶሙ፡ ወበረከቶሙ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ወልዶሙ፡ ፍቁረ፡ ማርያም። ቀዳሚሆሙ፡ ለመነኮሳት፡ አባ፡ እንጦንዮስ፡

msItem.title: Magic Prayer against the Tongue of the People
msItem.note: Copy of a 17th-century manuscript that obtained in Asmara in May 1899. A detailed description of this manuscript is found in the middle of , repeated on . The text ends abruptly on fol. 13r of the original, while it occupies fols 4r to 22v in the Vorlage. The name of the owner of the original was Gabra Giyorgis.

msItem.title: Ethiopian Text (fidal)
msItem.note: The Ethiopian text was copied by in two columns.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልደ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ዠዠዠዠዠ፡ ፩ አምላክ፡ ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ ልሳነ፡ ሰብእ፡ ዘመድ፡ ወባዕድ፡ ሞቅኛ፡ ወተንኰለኛ። ተማኅፀንኩ፡ በኆኅያተ፡ ስምከ፡ ካፍ። ወበቀዳማይ፡ ይውጣ፡ ዘጥንተ፡ ፊደሎን፡ አሌፍ። ከመ፡ ታድኅነኒ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ እም፡ ትንሥኤ፡ ልሳን፡ ወአፍ።

msItem.title: Transcription
msItem.note: The transcription of the Ethiopian text above. It was copied to the left of the two columns, leaving the right-hand side free for notes.

item.desc: A note by the hand of stating that ʾalaqā Baʾǝda Māryām of ʾAddi Galgǝl (Ṣallimā) was the copier of .
A note by the hand of stating that was copied from a manuscript from a monastery named ʾƎndā ʾƎndrǝyās in the district of ‘Decchi Itaes’, probably , which is in fact located in .

msItem.title: On the Differences between the Ethiopian Confession and the Russian Confession
msItem.note: This note explains the history of the Russian and the Ethiopian churches since the Council of Chalcedon. Cf. and .
msItem.incipit: በኢትዮጵያውያንና፡ በመስኮቦች፡ ማኸል፡ ያለ፡ የሃማኖት፡ መለያይት። የኢትዮጵያ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ካምስት፡ መቶኛ፡ ዓመት፡ ዠምሮ፡ የምትከተለው፡ ፍጹምና፡ ዘለዓለማዊ፡ የሆነ፡ ያንድ፡ ባህርይ፡ እምነት፡ ውግዘት፤ በመስከረምና፡ በጥቅምት፡ በ፬፻፶፩ ዓመት፡ በሆነው፡ በኬልቄዶን፡ ቦስፎሮ፡ ጉባኤ፡ ተነገረ።
በስመ፡ ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ መርበብተ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ዘረበቦሙ፡ ለአጋንንት፡ ከመ፡ መርበብተ፡ ዓሳ፡ ዘባሕር፡ እንዘ፡ ይብል፡ ሰዳካኤል፡ ሰዳካኤል፡ ሰዳካኤል፡

msItem.title: Prayer against Bāryā and Legewon
msItem.incipit: አስማተ፡ ህላዌሁ፡ ለሰሎሞን፡ ንንዕድ፡ አስማተ፡ ንዑድ፡ አእያስ፡ አእያስ፡ አእያስ፡

msItem.title: Prayer against Bāryā, Šotolāy and Legewon by the Magic Names through which Solomon saved himself from the Hands of the Blacksmiths
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ ባርያ፡ ወሾቶላይ፡ ወለሌዎን፡ በዝንቱ፡ አስማቲከ፡ ድኅረ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ እምእዴሆሙ፡ ለነሀብት፡
በስመ፡ ዓዲ፡ ካዕበ፡ ንገብር፡ ነገሥታተ፡ ወመበለታተሂ፡ እንዘ፡ ሀለዋ፡ ነዊሞን፡ ዘምስለ፡ እሞን፡

msItem.title: Prayer against Bāryā and Legewon, Colic, Migraine, Maggaññā, etc.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ እምብዝኃ፡ ድንጋጼ፡ ለነሀብት፡ እንዘ፡ ይብል፡ በሎፍሐም፡ ስምከ፡ ተማህፀንኩ፡ አድኅኖ፡ እምሕማመ፡ ባርያ፡ ወሌጌዎን፡ ቁርፀት፡ ወፍልፀት፡ ወመጋኛ፡ ወጉስምት፡ ፌራ፡ ወንዳድ፡

msItem.title: Prayer to loosen Witchcraft (maftǝḥe śǝrāy)
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ መፍትሔ፡ ሥራይ፡ ወዓይነተ፡ ባርያ፡ ወለጌዎን፡ አኸያ፡ ሽራህያ፡ አልሸዳይ፡

msItem.title: Prayer to loosen Witchcraft (maftǝḥe śǝrāy)
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ መፍትሔ፡ ሥራይ፡ ወኪን፡ አናኝታቹማኝኛኘማኑ፡

history.origin: Copy of a magic scroll, which belonged to a person with the name , copied by in the 20th century but not after 1949.

msItem.title: Prayer against Šotalāy
msItem.note: Copy by the hand of . The central theme of this prayer is the announcement to Elizabeth of the difficulties she will experience during the birth of , and the intervention of , who is referred to as ዘይእቲ፡ ማኅረሲት፡ ወጠባብ፡ ጥቀ፡. Salome acts as a female magician pronouncing magic names (ʾasmāt) over the woman in labour, being an allusion to the Gospel of Luke, chapter 1
msItem.incipit: ጸሎተ፡ ሾተላይ። በስመ፡ ወኮነ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ሄሮድስ፡ ንጉሠ፡ እስራኤል፡ ሀሎ፡ አሐዱ፡ ካህን፡ በኢየሩሳሌም፡ ዘስሙ፡ ዘካርያስ፡ ዘእምሥርወ፡ አሮን፡

history.origin: Copy by in the 20th century but not after 1949 from a manuscript, which once belonged to a person with the name .

msItem.title: Couplet
msItem.note: Containing 9 lines of text, dated to 1919 AM (= 1926/1927 AD) (ዘረባ፡ ናይ፡ ሐገረሰብ፡ ብ፡ ፲፱፻፲፱፡ ዓመት፡ ምህረት፡).
msItem.incipit: ወይ፡ ዘ𞟠ለፈ፡ ጨንቂ። ሰብ፡ እንታይ፡ በለ፡ እዞም፡ ጣልያን፡ ክኽእሉ፡ ድዮም፡ በ𞟠ቂ፡ ጣልያን፡ እወ፡ ጣልያን፡ በኧል፡ ብዙ𞟥፡ ስንቂ፡ ገንዘቡ፡ ዝህቦም፡ ንድኻታት፡ ፍርቂ፡

msItem.title: Commissioner De Rossi's Dream
msItem.note: Containing 9 lines of text.
msItem.incipit: 𞟥ልሚ፡ ናይ፡ ኮሚሰርያቶ፡ ደሮሲ።

supportDesc.collation: Two leaves, one of which is 125 mm wide, the other being 95 mm wide, which were glued together on the back side.

msItem.title: Note on the inhabitants of Tigray and ʾAgāme, the Amhara and the Italians
msItem.incipit: የትግሬ፡ የአጋሜ፡ ወንድማሞች፡ ምነው፡ አይን፡ ሳላችሁ፡ የማታዩ። ጆሮ፡ ሳላችሁም፡ የማትስሙ፡ ከአዲስ፡ አበባ፡ ያለውን፡ መንግሥት፡ ኤርትራ፡ ኢየሄዳችሁ፡ እንዳትነግዱ፡ እንዳትገዙ፡ እንዳትሸጡም፡ ከልክሎ፡ ጕዳታችሁን፡ ጀመረ።

msItem.note: Copy by the hand of from a manuscript, which contained the homily in honour to the archangel Rāguʾel. The beginning is missing. The text starts with the last lines of fol. 8v of the original, corresponding to 97, line 20.
msItem.incipit: wadaǧ samēn bēta krstiyān sarto bahagara māryām dabra ldatā wazatsamay ʿādā šawā dabra ḥadāsyu tāʿewā

msItem.title: List of Manuscripts of ʾAksum
msItem.note: Altogether 109 titles. Cf. . ፏ was written as ፋ with a stroke on top.
msItem.incipit: የመጻሕፍት፡ ቁጥር፡ ከዚህ፡ ቀጥሎ፡ ትጽፏል። ወንጌለ፡ ዘወርቅ፡ ፭፡ ድጕስ፡ ወንጌል፡ ፰፡ ታሪከ፡ ነገሥት፡ ፪፡ ሲናዶስ፡ ፩፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ሐዊ፡ ፩፡

item.desc: A note by the hand of at the bottom of the page.

msItem.title: Invoice by Blāttā Kidāna Māryām ʾAbarrā for the Supply of Manuscripts
msItem.note: Invoice presented by blāttā Kidāna Māryām ʾAbarrā to for manuscripts and books supplied for the Tripoli Exhibition. Done at Tripoli, 18.5.34. The list contains ten manuscripts and books, all of which were added to the Fonds Conti Rossini.
msItem.incipit: ክቡር፡ ፕሮፌሰር፡ ካርሎ፡ ኮንቲ፡ ሮሲኒ፡ የመንግሥት፡ አማካሪ፡ ሮማ፡ እርስዎ፡ የኢትዮጵያ፡ መጻሕፍት፡ ለመግዛት፡ አሳብ፡ እንዳለዎና፡ እኛ፡ በትሪፖሊ፡ ኤክስፖዚስዮን፡ ያወጣናችውን፡ መጻሕፍት፡ ዝርዝርና፡ ዋጋ፡ ጽፌ፡

msItem.title: Receipt for copying a Manuscript
msItem.note: Receipt issued by ʾalaqā Yoḥannǝs Taklu for the sum of 300 lire (farank) to Doctor Capitano Carbone (ካፒታኖ፡ ካርቦነ፡) for compiling and writing the Life and Malkǝʾ of ʾabuna ʿAbiya ʾƎgziʾ on parchment (). Issued in ʾAksum, 5.1.1938.
msItem.incipit: እኔ፡ አለቃ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ተክሉ። ከዶቶር፡ ካፒታኖ፡ ካርቦነ፡ የአክሱም፡ ረሲደንት። የጻድቅ፡ ቅዱስ፡ የአቡነ፡ ዓቢየ፡ እግዚእ፡ ገድል፡ ከነመልኩ፡ በብራና፡ ስለጻፍኩኝ።

supportDesc.collation: Smaller piece of paper, which was glued on .

msItem.title: Amharic Couplet
msItem.note: Couplet of five verses, written in Amharic, but with a title in Tigrinya
msItem.incipit: ግጥሚ፡ ናይ፡ አም𞟠ራ፡ አንዱም፡ ነግዶ፡ ይበላል፡ አንዱ፡ አርሶ፡

supportDesc.collation: Single paper leaf, which was glued on .

msItem.title: Shewan War Song
msItem.note: 24 lines, written by Mangǝste Nǝguse of Dabra Mārqos, which is possibly the town of
msItem.incipit:
ልቀም፡ እንደ፡ ስዲ፡ አድርጎ፡ አብጠጥሮ፡
እግዚአብሔር፡ ለሰጠው፡ ይገባል፡ አክብሮ፡
ድሩንና፡ ማጉን፡ ሐሩን፡ አስተባብሮ፡

msItem.title: Three Amharic Songs
msItem.note: According to the colophon authored by Munṭaz Dallala of Šǝttā, the Goǧǧāmite, 3rd Company, 3rd Bataillon; altogether 20 lines

msItem.title: Yādawā yataqǝrrārāw ba-Mǝnilǝk naw
msItem.incipit: ያደዋ፡ ጊዜ፡ የተቅራራው፡ በምኒልክ፡ ነው፡

msItem.title: Kazih gǝrǧā ba-Hāyla Sǝllāse gize yataqǝrrārāw naw
msItem.incipit: ከዚህ፡ ግርጃ፡ በሃይለ፡ ስላሴ፡ ጊዜ፡ የተቅራራው፡ ነው፡

msItem.title: Kazih gǝrǧā katašannafa yataqǝrrārāw naw
msItem.incipit: ከዚህ፡ ግርጃ፡ ከተሸነፈ፡ የተቅራራው፡ ንው፡

msItem.colophon: ጸሕፊሁ፡ ዘብሔረ፡ ጎጃም፡ ሙንጠዝ፡ ደለለ፡ የሽታ፡ ጤርሳ፡ በጠሊወኒ፡ ጤርሳ፡ ኩባንያ።

supportDesc.collation: Two single leaves that have been glued together. A third single leaf () was glued in front of .

handNote.desc: Very untrained hand and small script

item.desc: A note in Italian at top of the page indicating the content and the author.
A note in Italian at bottom of the page indicating the content and the author.
item.q: Canzoni del Goggiàm scritte da Dellelè Scità

msItem.title: War Poem
msItem.note: seven stanzas; without title
msItem.incipit:
ዘይሠርር፡ ፈረሰ፡ እሳት፡ ዘዘይሠርር፡
ፈጸሞሙ፡ ግብተ፡ በሰዓተ፡ ቅትር፡
ለዘ፡ መጽኡ፡ እም፡ ዐረብ፡ ወምስር።
msItem.explicit:
ማየሂ፡ አመ፡ ጎዘልከ፡ በገቦካ፡ ታኒካ፡
ለሎቀማ፡ አክሊለ፡ ወርቅ፡ በርእስከ፡ ተቀጸልካ።
ወለሰናይዲር፡ ኃይልከ፡ አመ፡ በጥይት፡ ለጐምካ፡
ትግራይ፡ ሐሽከር፡ ወረሴው፡ በይእቲ፡ አቕመስካ።

msItem.note: The text stops at the second line of the 13th stanza
msItem.incipit:
ሰላም፡ ለዝክረ፡ ስምከ፡ ዘተጸውአ፡ እም፡ ንእሱ።
በስመ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ወበስመ፡ መስፍን፡ ኢያሱ።
መኰንን፡ ጽድቅ፡ ኤልያስ፡ ለንጉሠ፡ ነገሥት፡ ዓቃቤ፡ ንግሡ።
ኢታምልክ፡ ባዕደ፡ ኢትዮጵያ፡ በአድያማቲሃ፡ ታንሶሱ።
ወእለ፡ የአምኑ፡ በስምከ፡ ኪያሃ፡ ወረሱ።

msItem.title: Poem in Honour of Emperor Tewodros
msItem.note: without title; dedicated to ; written on the left column
msItem.incipit:
መቸ፡ ሞተና፡ መቸ፡ ተረሳ።
መቅደላ፡ ያለው፡ የቋራው፡ ካሳ።
እንግዲህ፡ እኔ፡ ሌላ፡ አላነሳ።
ከፈረስ፡ ታጠቅ፡ ከጐበዝ፡ ካሳ።

msItem.title: Poem in Honour of Emperor Yoḥannǝs
msItem.note: dedicated to ; entitled ፪ተኛ፡ ያጼ፡ ዮሐንስ፡; written on the left column
msItem.incipit:
እውነት፡ መስሏቸው፡ ፈርሶ፡ መሬት።
ቦሬሳው፡ መጣ፡ እሳት፡ በሳት።
ቦሬሳው፡ ካሳን፡ አትነካኩት።
የተቀባ፡ ነው፡ እንደ፡ ዳዊት።

item.desc: Letterhead from the ‘R. Residenza di Acachi — il Presidente’
Explanatory notes by in the right-hand columns.

msItem.title: Four Couplets dedicated to Women (Yasetočč gǝṭǝm)
msItem.note: The third couplet is preceded by a quatrain in Gǝʾǝz, which is then repeated and expanded upon in Amharic.
msItem.incipit: ባልንጅሮቺ፡ ቁሙ፡ በተራ፡ እንጨት፡ ሰብሬ፡ ቤት፡ እስከሰራ፡

item.desc: Four explanatory notes by below the texts.
Dedication of the author Yǝlāl Lǝǧǧ and his sister wayzaro ʾAbbabač

Updated after review by Magdalena Krzyżanowska
